[relative path without dot](foo/bar.txt)

[relative path with dot](./foo/bar.txt)

[relative path with slash](/foo/bar.txt)

[relative path with parent](../foo/bar.txt)

[relative path with too much parents](../../../../../../../../../../../foo/bar.txt)

[schema relative](//example.com/foo.txt)

[external link](https://example.com/foo.txt)

[hash link](#this-is-hash)
